page.title: 05Clubs
page.content: THERE ARE 8 CLUBS BASED IN THIS AREA OF THORNHILL WITH THE EXCEPTION OF HAILE.THERE ARE THE BROWNIES ,GUIDES, CUBS,YOUTH CLUB,HAILE PUB,FOOTBALL CLUB,BADMINTON CLUB,PLAYGROUP. { CUBS.THERE ARE 12 CUBS.THEY MEET EVERY THURSDAY AT 7.15pm AND FINISHED AT 9.00pm THERE AGE LIMIT IS 7 TO 11. HAILE PUB.THE PUB AT HAILE IS CALLED THE BUCKS HEAD AND THE BREWERS ARE CALLED MATTHEW BROWN CUMBERLAND THE BEER COSTS 62p A PINT. YOUTH CLUB.THERE ARE FOUR STAFF AT THORNHILL YOUTH CLUB.THERE IS A DISCO EVERY FRIDAY NIGHT FROM 7.00pm TO 11.15pm.THERE ARE 250 MEMBERS.THERE ARE TWO MEETINGS A WEEK FOR ONE FOR THE JUNIORS AND ONE FOR THE SENIORS. FOOTBALL CLUB.THORNHILL HAS A FOOTBALL CLUB CALLED THORNHILL SUPERSTOMERS THERE WAS AN UNDER 12'VS BUT JOHN JACKSON STOPPED DOING IT.
